title: selfencrypting
extract: Hardware-based full disk encryption. ... In relation to hard disk drives, the term Self-encrypting drive (SED) is in more common usage. Hardware-FDE has two major components: the hardware encryptor and the data store.
extract_html: Hardware-based full disk encryption. ... In relation to hard disk drives, the term Self-encrypting drive (SED) is in more common usage. Hardware-FDE has two major components: the hardware encryptor and the data store.
